member.name: T:Whois.NET.WhoisClient
member.summary: A WhoisClient structure for quering whois servers.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.Query(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send WHOIS query to WHOIS server, requery to referral servers recursive, and return the response from WHOIS server.
member.param: domain name (ex."nic.ad.jp")or IP address (ex."192.41.192.40") to be queried.
FQDN of whois server (ex."whois.arin.net"). This parameter is optional (default value is null) to determine server automatically.
TCP port number to connect whois server. This parameter is optional, and default value is 43.
Encoding method to decode the result of query. This parameter is optional (default value is null) to using ASCII encoding.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds.
The number of times a connection will be attempted.
member.returns: The strong typed result of query which responded from WHOIS server.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.QueryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send WHOIS query to WHOIS server, requery to referral servers recursive, and return the response from WHOIS server.
member.param: domain name (ex."nic.ad.jp")or IP address (ex."192.41.192.40") to be queried.
FQDN of whois server (ex."whois.arin.net"). This parameter is optional (default value is null) to determine server automatically.
TCP port number to connect whois server. This parameter is optional, and default value is 43.
Encoding method to decode the result of query. This parameter is optional (default value is null) to using ASCII encoding.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds.
The number of times a connection will be attempted.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: The strong typed result of query which responded from WHOIS server.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.QueryRecursive(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Queries recursively to determine the proper endpoint for an IP or domain.
member.param: The query for the whois server.
The list of servers previously queried.
The port to query.
The encoding to use during the query.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds.
The number of times a connection will be attempted.
member.returns: A whois response structure containing the results of the whois queries.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.QueryRecursiveAsync(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Queries recursively to determine the proper endpoint for an IP or domain.
member.param: The query for the whois server.
The list of servers previously queried.
The port to query.
The encoding to use during the query.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds.
The number of times a connection will be attempted.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: A whois response structure containing the results of the whois queries.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.HasReferral(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Check if a response contains a referral.
member.param: The raw response.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.RawQuery(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32)
member.summary: Send simple WHOIS query to WHOIS server, and return the response from WHOIS server. (No requery to referral servers, and No parse the result of query.)
member.param: domain name (ex."nic.ad.jp")or IP address (ex."192.41.192.40") to be queried.
FQDN of whois server (ex."whois.arin.net").
TCP port number to connect whois server. This parameter is optional, and default value is 43.
Encoding method to decode the result of query. This parameter is optional (default value is null) to using ASCII encoding.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds. Function returns empty string if it times out.
member.returns: The raw data decoded by encoding parameter from the WHOIS server that responded, or an empty string if a connection cannot be established.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisClient.RawQueryAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send simple WHOIS query to WHOIS server, and return the response from WHOIS server. (No requery to referral servers, and No parse the result of query.)
member.param: domain name (ex."nic.ad.jp")or IP address (ex."192.41.192.40") to be queried.
FQDN of whois server (ex."whois.arin.net").
TCP port number to connect whois server. This parameter is optional, and default value is 43.
Encoding method to decode the result of query. This parameter is optional (default value is null) to using ASCII encoding.
A timespan to limit the connection attempt, in seconds. Function returns empty string if it times out.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
member.returns: The raw data decoded by encoding parameter from the WHOIS server that responded, or an empty string if a connection cannot be established.

member.name: T:Whois.NET.WhoisResponse
member.summary: A structure containing the whois response information.

member.name: P:Whois.NET.WhoisResponse.RespondedServers
member.summary: FQDN of WHOIS servers which sent query. The last element is the WHOIS server name that latest queried.

member.name: M:Whois.NET.WhoisResponse.#ctor(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: A constructor that parses the provided response information.
member.param: The servers that responded to the request.
The raw response from the last server.
